name: ClawPilot
description: Control and inspect the Recall transcript copilot bridge.

bridgeBaseUrl.description: Base URL for the copilot bridge service

bridgeToken.description: Optional bearer token for bridge control endpoints

agentName.description: Optional agent name used for default bot naming

teamAgent.description: Treat this copilot as a team agent (shared-safe team context rules).

autoJoinMeetingLinks.description: Automatically launch a meeting bot when a plain meeting URL is posted.

autoJoinReplaceActive.description: When auto-join is triggered from a plain URL, replace an already active bot.

blockLegacyMeetingLaunchScripts.description: Block model exec attempts that call legacy meeting-launch shell scripts.

bridgeToken.label: Bridge Token
bridgeToken.help: Optional bearer token if your bridge requires auth

agentName.label: Agent Name
agentName.help: Optional fallback for bot naming if runtime context has no agent name.

teamAgent.label: Team Agent
teamAgent.help: Enable when this copilot serves a team workspace rather than a personal owner context.

autoJoinMeetingLinks.label: Auto-Join Meeting Links
autoJoinMeetingLinks.help: On by default. Plain meeting URLs trigger /launch through bridge.

autoJoinReplaceActive.label: Auto-Join Replaces Active Bot
autoJoinReplaceActive.help: Off by default. Keep off to avoid duplicate URL posts replacing the active bot.

blockLegacyMeetingLaunchScripts.label: Block Legacy Launch Scripts
blockLegacyMeetingLaunchScripts.help: On by default. Prevents model exec calls from running old launch script paths.
